shortDescription: Swipe at and touch shape, on back
longDescription: {0} is on their back. Place a shape near one of {0}'s hands. {0} is able to swipe at and touch the shape.

shortDescription: Swipe at and touch shape, on side
longDescription: {0} is on their side. Place a shape near one of {0}'s hands. {0} is able to swipe at and touch the shape.

shortDescription: Swipe at and touch shape, seated and supported
longDescription: {0} is seated and supported (e.g. you holding them up). Place a shape near one of {0}'s hands. {0} is able to swipe at and touch the shape.

shortDescription: Hear cups and search, on back
longDescription: {0} is on their back. Knock two cups together continuously away from {0}, so that they cannot see the cups, but can still hear them. {0} is able to search for the source of the sounds, but not necessarily locate the cups.

shortDescription: Hear cups and search, on side
longDescription: {0} is on their side. Knock two cups together continuously away from {0}, so that they cannot see the cups, but can still hear them. {0} is able to search for the source of the sounds, but not necessarily locate the cups.

shortDescription: Hear cups and search, seated and supported
longDescription: {0} is seated and supported (e.g. you holding them up). Knock two cups together continuously away from {0}, so that they cannot see the cups, but can still hear them. {0} is able to search for the source of the sounds, but not necessarily locate the cups.

shortDescription: Hear cups and search with head side turn, on tummy
longDescription: {0} is on their tummy. Knock two cups together continuously on one side of {0}'s head, so that they cannot see the cups, but can still hear them. {0} is able to search for the source of the sounds by turning their head to the side, but not necessarily locate the cups.

shortDescription: Hear cups and search with head raised up, on tummy
longDescription: {0} is on their tummy. Knock two cups together continuously above {0}'s head, so that they cannot see the cups, but can still hear them. {0} is able to search for the source of the sounds by raising their head up slightly, but not necessarily locate the cups.

shortDescription: Eye focus switching between two cups, on back
longDescription: {0} is on their back. Hold two cups steady a few inches apart in front of {0}'s face. {0} is able to switch eye focus back and forth between the two cups.

shortDescription: Eye focus switching between two cups, on side
longDescription: {0} is on their side. Hold two cups steady a few inches apart in front of {0}'s face. {0} is able to switch eye focus back and forth between the two cups.

shortDescription: Eye focus switching between two cups, seated and supported
longDescription: {0} is seated and supported (e.g. you holding them up). Hold two cups steady a few inches apart in front of {0}'s face. {0} is able to switch eye focus back and forth between the two cups.

shortDescription: Extend toes reflexively, when parent scratching foot sole
longDescription: Scratch one of the foot soles of {0}. {0} is able to extend their toes reflexively.

shortDescription: Pull up leg reflexively, when parent poking foot sole
longDescription: Poke one of the foot soles of {0}. {0} is able to pull up their leg reflexively.

shortDescription: Grasp reflexively, when parent placing finger in palm
longDescription: Place your finger in one of the hand palms of {0}. {0} is able to grasp your finger reflexively.

shortDescription: Listen for 30 seconds, when parent speaking
longDescription: Speak to {0} and in front of their face. {0} is able to listen and focus on you in 30 seconds.

shortDescription: Hold chest up, on tummy and forearms
longDescription: {0} is on their tummy. {0} is able to hold their chest up, putting weight on their forearms in support.
